element.name: browserHistory
element.label: Use browser history
Use browser history
element.description: If enabled the browsers history will be used within the reservation modal allowing the users to navigate with the native controls. Can be disabled when your store is already using the browsers history internally and the modals history conflicts with it.

element.name: useGeolocationImmediately
element.label: Use Geolocation immediately
Use Geolocation immediately
element.description: If enabled, whenever the user opens the store list the browsers geolocation will be requested immediately instead of only after pressing the locate me button.

element.name: testMode
element.label: Testmode
Testmode
element.description: When set to true no buttons will be rendered within the users browser, till the page was once opened with a query parameter like rrTesting=start. A testing session can be stopped by opening the page with rrTesting=end

element.name: countries
element.label: Countries
Countries
element.description: Set the available countries for the store list search

element.name: displayType
element.label: Display on product detail page
Display on product detail page
element.description: Choose what should be displayed on the product detail page. Reservation button - A button that opens a popup with a store list and the availability of the selected product in these stores. Availability in store - A box that directly shows the availability of the product in the store. The customer has to select a store the first time.

element.name: renderLiveInventoryMode
element.label: Store selection
Store selection
element.description: Only relevant if "Show availability in store" is selected above. Choose how the customer can select his store. Modal - Opens a popup where the customer can search for his store via zip code or geolocation. Also shows address, distance and opening hours if available. Dropdown - A simple dropdown where the customer can choose the store from. Recommended only for small amount of stores.

element.name: inventoryHideNumber
element.label: Hide stock
Hide stock
element.description: Hides the stock number and therefore display only if the product is available or not.

element.name: inventoryShowExactUntil
element.label: Show exact inventory until
Show exact inventory until
element.description: If inventory is higher than the given number the inventory will be displayed as "X+ Available"

element.name: inventoryShowLowUntil
element.label: Show low inventory until
Show low inventory until
element.description: If inventory is lower than the given number the inventory will be displayed in the state-warning color.

element.name: termsLink
element.label: Terms Link
Terms Link
element.description: Add an url to the terms and condition page, also enforces the user to accept them before placing an reservation

element.name: privacyLink
element.label: Privacy Link
Privacy Link
element.description: Add an url to the privacy page, also enforces the user to accept them before placing an reservation

element.name: colors
element.label: Colors
Colors
element.description: Please use only the 3 numbers of rgb schema. rgb(1,2,3) -> 1,2,3

element.name: translations
element.label: Translations JSON
Translations JSON
element.description: JSON format. All strings can be found in the github repo
